def codechef_2():
    n,q=map(int,raw_input().split())
    array=map(int,raw_input().split())
    mx=max(array)
    mn=min(array)
    check=[]
    while(q):
        v=int(raw_input())
        check.append(v)
        q=q-1
    for i in check:
        if(i<=mx and i>=mn):
            print 'Yes'
        else:
            print 'No'        
codechef_2()
